title: Does anyone know what lovely font this is? From http://wearefierce.org/
author: Fragzone

comments.content:
Don't think it's a font as it, more a classic serif ( [Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233930/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/baskerville) for instance]]) that has been post-treated.  
Only one ready-to-go option but very impressive: [Dala Prisma](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233930/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala_floda/dala_prisma)

Working link for Dala Prisma [https://commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala\_floda/dala\_prisma](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233930/https:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala_floda/dala_prisma "https://commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala\_floda/dala\_prisma")  
Also a caps only font: Crescendo [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/crescendo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233930/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/crescendo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/crescendo/")  
Don
